1372650.name: DAMN!
1372650.description:
1991 — it seems like any other sweltering July in the sleepy suburbs of Fairweather Falls.. until a cursed VHS unleashes untold horrors upon the neighborhood, turns the residents evil, and generally makes April & Joey's summer a total bummer.

Our heroes must exorcise their neighbors from hell, fight their way back to the haunted High School, and rewind their summer to save the world!

Evoking moody '80s / '90s teen-horror with Saturday morning cartoons and a manic, humorous tone, DAMN! honors '90s co-op classics as only an unofficial spiritual sequel could.

FEATURES

  • Two heads are better than dead — Team up in local co-op and blast your way through the 'burbs of Fairweather Valley armed with Splasha squirt guns loaded with holy water.

  • Interactive, Procedural Environments — Knock over mailboxes, trashcans, and more to find household weapons that exploit monster weaknesses. Freeze Zombos, zap Zaplings, and vaporize Vampunks with Garlic Pizza.

  • Collect VHS tokens from Boss Demons — Unlock new permanent upgrades in The Hideout to power up your next run.

  • Track down the possessed — Use the RadWatch, your radical Radar Radio, to hunt down possessed citizens in procedurally-generated levels. Level it up by slaying monsters to boost its range.

  • 16-bit characters in a 3D nightmare — Retro-styled characters feel right at home in an ever-changing top-down 3D world of nightmare nostalgia, featuring a funky, thrilling dynamic soundtrack.

DAMN! Trademark Curse Free Studios 2026
1372650.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
